solution_line_template: This year, Kyle was only able to pick {roses_last_year}/{half_divisor} = <<{roses_last_year}/{half_divisor}={roses_this_year}>>{roses_this_year} roses.
He wants to give his mother {roses_last_year} x {twice_multiplier} = <<{roses_last_year}*{twice_multiplier}={desired_roses}>>{desired_roses} roses.
He would have to spend {roses_needed} x {cost_per_rose} = $<<{roses_needed}*{cost_per_rose}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
